name: Hair Salon Management Website
desc: Major Assignment for the Software Engineering course: Build a system to manage appointments, customers, and services for a hair salon.

name: Grocery Store Management Website.
desc: Course Project for System Analysis and Design (PTTK): A web application that supports product management, stock-in, stock-out, inventory tracking, and revenue management for a grocery store.

name: Fashion Store Management Website.
desc: Course Project for IT Project Management (QLDA): Developing a system to manage products, invoices, customers, and revenue for a fashion clothing store.
